= Aerie Proof Envelope
:toc:
:toclevels: 2

== Overview

Every response includes a proof envelope. Realtime streams use a light envelope.
Forensics and audit use a full envelope with A2ML attestation + VQL proof.

== Fields

[cols="1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Field | Description

| result_hash
| sha256 of the payload

| policy_hash
| sha256 of the entitlement policy

| query_id
| UUID for query/subscription event

| issued_at
| RFC3339 timestamp (tx_time reference)

| proof_type
| light or full

| signature
| Ed25519 signature over envelope
|===

== Light Envelope

Includes: result_hash, policy_hash, query_id, issued_at, signature

== Full Envelope

Includes: light fields plus A2ML attestation + VQL proof blob
